page.title: 05LANDSCAPE OF RIVER THAMES
page.content: The piece of river between Richmond and Twickenham bridges is all{swan {sanctuary.}A swan sanctuary is a place where you can't fish because the lead poisons the swans .We need a swan sanctuary to protect the swans as they are becoming rare. The river is used for{house boats}. House boats are instead of houses.They are half boat and half house.Other boats are for nomal rides up and down the river . { Richmond Bridge}was built out of stone .It has 7 arches and is very elegant. It has a row of grand lights. {Twickenham Bridge}is made of concrete. Before Twickenham Bridge was built there used to be a ferry to take people to the other side of the river. Shortly after the bridge was built the ferry closed down.
